name: FPA Technology Services Inc.
tagline: The preeminent outsourced IT service provider
description: FPA Technology Services, Inc. is the preeminent outsourced IT service provider for growing businesses in the greater Los Angeles area specializing in working with Registered Investment Advisors, CPA's and Business Managers, Manufacturers and Distributors, and Non-Profits. As a single source for all the technology services an organization may need, FPA focuses on assisting clients to remove the pain, worry, and risk associated with their technology.
